alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Canadian; Cleveland; Grady; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 3:52AM CDT until July 09 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Grady County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Central Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... Southern Canadian County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 352 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Verden, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Southwestern Oklahoma City, southwestern Norman, Chickasha, Newcastle, Blanchard, Noble, Tuttle, Goldsby, Minco, Rush Springs, Cyril, Dibble, Washington, Cole, Alex, Verden, Cement, Amber, Bridge Creek, and Pocasset. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
